objects.name: Explanation
objects.string:
Use arrow keys or touch 
to move the car.
Touch controls are visible 
only on mobile devices by defaulr.

events.comment: This example require the latest version of GDevelop5 to be able to change the pitch of the sound during runtime
start playing the engine sound on a channel
At the beginning of the scene, if the device is NOT a mobile device, hide the touch controls
change the pitch of the sound based on the acceleration of the car
Rotate the car but only if the acceleration is > or < 0
If touch controls available, also use the left and right button to rotate the car
If touch controls available, also use the acceleration button to accelerate the car
If touch controls available, also use the break button to break the car
Braking at high speed using keyboard
Breaking at high speed using touch controls
If both acceleration and break is down, create some smoke then shoot the car out
Move the car according to its acceleration
Slowing down car if it not accelerating
Collision management, if car is in collisiotn with something, move the car away to avoid it going through walls
Collision with effects, if the car is in collision with something, create some smoke and sparks
Smoke and effects management, move smoke and delete smoke and sparks after some time
Make the camere follow the car and display it speed in the top left corner
